articles.description: With India's Playing XI across formats wearing a completely new look, the way back in the team for all ousted players appears a bridge too far to cross, although one batter is putting in the hard yards.
articles.content: Being out of the Indian team is never easy, especially if you have been a part of it for a significant amount of time. In the last one year, several stars have had to make their way out of the Playin… [+2376 chars]
